name: SOLAR BATTALION
description: SOLAR BATTALION is a neo-noir cyberpunk science fiction action game.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8,10 Processor: intel duel core 2 GHZ or AMD duel core 2 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia geforce 400 series or AMD radeon HD 6000 series,2 GB video card (minimum shader model 5.0) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: directX compatible sound card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: 7,8,10 Processor: intel quad core (i5 2300) or AMD octocore (fx 8150) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia geforce 660Ti or greater,2 GB video card (minimum shader model 5.0) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: directX compatible sound card with latest drivers
